Text:
We prefer to take requests to our special requesting mail... which is dedicated to that. It's likely better than spoiling others' bandwith.
Anyway you made me cracking this soft, even if I didn't have a lot of time and I may do a generic patcher for further versions.
And, however, it is a praiseworthy try for the whole community using this soft and you deserve respect for taking time uploading/spreading things by yourself (something rare today).

ohh!! its you!! sorry did notice i was not expecting you here!

thanks and keep it up dudes!! you are great!
